body: ConocoPhillips ( COP ) has raised the company's quarterly dividend to 26.5 cents per share, an increase of 6 percent. The dividend is payable on March 1, 2017, to stockholders of record at the close of business on Feb. 14, 2017. Corning ( GLW ) declared a quarterly dividend of $0.155 per share, a 14.8% increase in the company's quarterly common stock dividend. The 2017 first-quarter dividend is payable on March 31, 2017, to shareholders of record on Feb. 28, 2017. Apple has declared a cash dividend of $0.57 per share of the Company's common stock. The dividend is payable on February 16, 2017 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on February 13, 2017. Aflac declared the first quarter cash dividend. The first quarter dividend of $.43 per share is payable on March 1, 2017, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 15, 2017. Rockwell Collins ( COL ) has declared a quarterly dividend of 33 cents per share on its common stock, payable March 6, 2017, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 13, 2017. Avery Dennison ( AVY ) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.41 per share. The dividend is payable March 15, 2017, to shareholders of record on March 1, 2017. United States Steel ( X ) declared a dividend of five cents per share on U. S. Steel Common Stock. The dividend is payable March 10, 2017, to stockholders of record at the close of business February 10, 2017. Murphy Oil (MUR) declared a quarterly cash dividend on the Common Stock of Murphy Oil Corporation of $0.25 per share, or $1.00 per share on an annualized basis. The dividend is payable March 1, 2017 to holders of record February 13, 2017.
title: Daily Dividend Report: COP, GLW, AAPL, AFL, COL, AVY, X, MUR
